meanings.definition: A type of cover for a vehicle, typically a convertible car.
meanings.sent1: The tonneaus kept the interior of the car dry during the rain.
meanings.sent2: He installed tonneaus on his convertible to protect the seats from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog thought the tonneaus were giant blankets for him to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed under the tonneaus as she pretended the car was a secret hideout.
meanings.sent5: The bright red tonneaus made the car look sleek and stylish.
